Forgive me if I sound n00b, but, you specify using the activator. The torrent doesn't come packaged with and activator, rather a rar file named 'Windows Installer'. This flagged up as a Trojan when transferring to a USB stick.

I installed windows, skipped activation, and it's running. System info shows a product key and states that it is activated, without using the packaged stuff. 

So, can you confirm whether this copy of windows Is pre-activated?

how to fix this ?
http://answers.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/forum/windows_7-hardware/a-required-cddvd-device-driver-is-missing-usb/61eda679-66cc-4512-b175-d02871394461

i had BSoD after trying to install AHCI mode from USB drve.

i had to use a different usb port and when the prompt came up to specify the missing driver (AHCI), i had to remove the usb drive and put it in ANOTHER usb port.

then browse through the list in "X:$WinPEDriver$x64..." to find your AHCI driver.

i don't understand why this happens, but it works this way.
